model_answer: The correct answer is B: A close-up of a spherical satellite with multiple antennae alongside a labeled diagram reading "Vanguard I." The audio describes how the speaker was looking at a video about the Vanguard 1 satellite, which was launched in 1958 to measure Earth's shape and the difference in the equatorial bulge. The video likely shows a close-up of the satellite, including its spherical shape and multiple antennae, along with a labeled diagram explaining its purpose and name.
Option B: A split-screen showing a portrait of a man in an orange garment and a statue of Nicolaus Copernicus holding a celestial sphere.
